description:
Looking for a fuss-free, clean look boardshort that moves like you do? We've got you. Look no further than the Riveter Boardshort. With a shorter 7" inseam and 4-way stretch (thanks Spandex) this men's short is ready for action.

Featuring a Velcro closure pocket in the back (ideal for money or your car key) and a fixed waistband with drawcord tie closure, the Riveter Boardshort is an easy go-to for daily wear.

What's more, the Riveter is made from 92% recycled polyester, making it planet-friendly too. Score!
name: Prana Riveter Boardshorts, 9" Inseam - Mens
